title: 15-year-old girl shot in head in Queens
content:
A 15-year-old girl was shot in the head inside her Queens apartment Friday afternoon, according to authorities.
She was rushed to St. John’s Episcopal Hospital in extremely critical condition.
The shooting occurred around 12:20 p.m. on Collier Avenue near Beach 22nd Street in Far Rockaway, police said.
The teen had recently moved with her mother and sister into the apartment over the summer, according to a neighbor, who only gave his first name, Damon, 52.
The motive was not immediately clear. A suspect has yet to be identified.
